statements: SELECT * FROM rewards_users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM rewards_users WHERE points > 100;
SELECT username, points FROM rewards_users ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards_users WHERE goals_met = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username, points FROM rewards_users ORDER BY username;
SELECT * FROM rewards_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, points FROM rewards_users WHERE goals_met IS FALSE;
SELECT user_id, username, points FROM rewards_users WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND points BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT user_id, username, points FROM rewards_users WHERE points < 50 OR goals_met IS TRUE ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserRewards
SELECT user_id, reward_points FROM UserRewards WHERE goal_met = TRUE
SELECT option_name, calories FROM NutritiousOptions WHERE is_nutritious = TRUE
SELECT * FROM UserRewards ORDER BY reward_points DESC
SELECT option_name, protein_grams FROM NutritiousOptions ORDER BY calories ASC
SELECT * FROM UserRewards WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, reward_points FROM UserRewards WHERE goal_met = TRUE;
SELECT option_name, calories, protein_grams FROM NutritiousOptions WHERE is_nutritious = TRUE ORDER BY calories DESC;
SELECT * FROM NutritiousOptions WHERE protein_grams > 20 AND calories < 200;
SELECT user_id, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM UserRewards GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(reward_points) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE points > 100;
SELECT user_id, username, points FROM Users ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, UR.reward_description, UR.reward_points FROM Users U JOIN UserRewards UR ON U.user_id = UR.user_id;
SELECT U.username, U.points, UG.goal_description, UG.goal_points FROM Users U LEFT JOIN UserGoals UG ON U.user_id = UG.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY username;
SELECT Users.username, UserRewards.reward_description FROM Users JOIN UserRewards ON Users.user_id = UserRewards.user_id WHERE Users.points >= 500;
SELECT Users.username, COUNT(UserGoals.goal_id) AS total_goals FROM Users LEFT JOIN UserGoals ON Users.user_id = UserGoals.user_id GROUP BY Users.user_id ORDER BY total_goals DESC;

SELECT Users.username, UserRewards.reward_description, UserGoals.goal_description FROM Users LEFT JOIN UserRewards ON Users.user_id = UserRewards.user_id LEFT JOIN UserGoals ON Users.user_id = UserGoals.user_id WHERE Users.points BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY Users.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, rewards_points FROM users WHERE rewards_points > 100 ORDER BY rewards_points ASC;
SELECT * FROM goals WHERE target_carbs < 50;
SELECT user_id, meal_time, calories FROM food_log WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE rewards_points > 100 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, target_calories, target_protein, target_carbs FROM goals WHERE target_calories > 2000;
SELECT log_id, meal_time, calories, protein, carbs FROM food_log WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY meal_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, reward_description, reward_points_required FROM rewards WHERE reward_points_required BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY reward_points_required DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, email, has_consistently_chosen_nutritious_options FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM meal_options ORDER BY calories DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(meal_id) AS total_meals FROM user_meals GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY age DESC, username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND has_consistently_chosen_nutritious_options = TRUE;
SELECT u.username, m.option_name, m.calories, m.protein, m.fiber FROM users u JOIN user_meals um ON u.user_id = um.user_id JOIN meal_options m ON um.meal_option_id = m.meal_option_id;
SELECT u.username, g.target_calories, g.target_protein, g.target_fiber FROM users u JOIN goals g ON u.user_id = g.user_id WHERE g.target_calories > 2000;
SELECT r.reward_description, r.reward_points, u.username FROM rewards r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.reward_points > 50 ORDER BY r.reward_points DESC;
